title: Fluorophore
description: This element describes the Fluorophore whose Emission is used to produce this Channel. [plain text string].

subCategoriesOrder.ManufacturerSpec: This describes the Manufacturer specifications for this component (i.e., Manufacturer Name, Model designation and Catalog Number).
subCategoriesOrder.Fluorophore: This element describes the Fluorophore whose Emission is used to produce this Channel. [plain text string].

Name.description: This field records a descriptive term that designates this Fluorophore as specified by the Manufacturer. For example, it might be the name of a specific Fluorescence Protein variant, or the name used by the Manufactuer for an organic dye.

ID.description: A Unique Identifier for this component.

Type.description: This field records a term that describes the general category of the Fluorescent Label used in this case.

ExcitationWavelength.description: This field records the Excitation Wavelength used for this Channel.

EmissionWavelength.description: This field records the Emission Wavelength used for this Channel.

Concentration.description: This field records the Concentration of this Fluorophore that was used to stain the Sample and was imaged in this Channel.

FBBaseID.description: In case the Fluorophore is a Fluorescent Protein, this field records its FPBaseID (FPBase.org).

PrimaryPublicationID.description: This field captures the a Unique Identifier for the Primary Publication describing this Fluorescent Label. Examples include, Digital Object Identifier (DOI), PubMed Central Identifier (PMCID), ArXiv.org ID etc.

Manufacturer.description: This field refers to the company, research group or individual who manufactured this hardware component.

Model.description: This field refers to the Model name or any other designation the Manufacturer uses for this component.

CatalogNumber.description: This field records the Catalog, Part or Serial Number used by the Manufacturer to uniquely identify this component.

LotNumber.description: The Lot Number used by the Manufacturer to refer to a specific production batch or lot for this component.

Tier.description: The tier level of this component.
